Trial_Design.evidence: In this single-centre RCT, women eligible for PMBR were assigned in a 1:1 ratio

Intervention.evidence: either standard care alone (control) or standard care and a pDA (intervention)

Objective.evidence: This study evaluated the effectiveness of a PMBR-specific patient decision aid (pDA) compared with high-quality standard care.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was decisional conflict after the decision.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: women eligible for PMBR were assigned in a 1:1 ratio

Number_Randomised.evidence: A total of 134 patients were enrolled (66 intervention, 68 control).

Result_Outcome.evidence: No significant differences were found in the primary (MD −2.8, 95% c.i., −8.4 to 2.8, Cohen’s d −0.18)
